message: Let's start with a fair but generous offer. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. We can work out a better deal later if you like.
Your offer was quite generous towards yourself, Alice. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor. Think carefully, the value of the money decreases rapidly for both of us.
Let's be fair.  We both have a lot to lose if we keep rejecting offers.  A 50/50 split seems like the best way to ensure we both get something.
